timeline.bodyText: should this be changed ?,here were we testing , if states get changed on publich event from draft to release ?
timeline.author: rednitish

replies.bodyText:
changePublishState handles:

change draft to released
or
change released to draft

On line 104 there is a test for changePublishState that matches "Publish" button. That's why I changed this test to cover the other scenario,
replies.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: I updated the tests so that it covers the click for both scenarios!
replies.author: xdavidson
